mapper.select: SELECT L.LESSON_NO as lessonNo FROM LESSONS L INNER JOIN USERS U ON L.USER_NO = U.USER_NO ORDER BY L.LESSON_NO DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT file_name as fileName , file_type as fileType , file_path as filePath FROM LESSON_FIELS WHERE lesson_no = #{lessonNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON_FIELS (LESSON_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE) VALUES (#{lessonFile.lessonNo}, #{lessonFile.fileName}, #{lessonFile.filePath}, #{lessonFile.fileType});
